name: Heart Breaker (itch)
description:
Heart Breaker is a fun, simple and great time waster.

Your goal is to break as many heart as possible before your heart breaks.

Features:
+ Addictive
+ Nice and simple graphics
+ Optimized to work on majority of Android devices
+ Rated for Everyone
+ No ads
+ No In-Game Purchases
